---
id: restore-login-attempts
title: "Restore login attempts."
description: "The API allows to restore the login attempts for a specified user. It is useful for resetting the login attempts count, especially after a user successfully logs in or if there was an error tracking the login attempts."
sidebar_label: "Restore login attempts."
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/seerportal-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Restore login attempts."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/restoreLoginAttempts"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API allows to restore the login attempts for a specified user. It is useful for resetting the login attempts count, especially after a user successfully logs in or if there was an error tracking the login attempts.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"user_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"integer[]"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer"},"description":"The unique identifier of the user whose login attempt you want to restore."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
</MimeTabs><div>
